games.title: MatchVentures
games.description: MatchVentures is a captivating match-3 adventure game where you explore the dark dungeons of Cliffmont Castle. As you journey through vast levels, collect gems and jewels while overcoming various obstacles in a quest to rebuild the castle destroyed by the evil dragon master, Dragor. With the help of Finlea the Leprechaun and her band of dwarves, you’ll battle enemies, explore hidden caves, and solve intricate puzzles. Perfect for fans of match-3 and fantasy adventure games, MatchVentures invites
features: Use the left mouse button to select and swap items.

games.title: Rumblets GO
games.description: Rumblets GO is a cute and chill roguelike adventure filled with elemental pets. Step into a cozy world where you hatch eggs to discover playful creatures with Fire, Nature, and Water powers. Relax with auto-battles, test your luck in mystery events, and evolve your companions to take on powerful bosses.FeaturesCollect whimsical critters with unique personalities and animationsElemental matchups with simple yet strategic gameplayRelaxing auto-battles for easy, casual funBuild your squad and mix s

games.title: Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley
games.description: Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley is a clicker science-based idle game where you get to delve into the prehistoric world of dinosaurs. Uncover hidden fossils and construct your own Jurassic simulation as you complete missions to earn fossil points, unlocking a diverse array of unique dinosaur species. Collect Trait Cards to automate fossil production, allowing for effortless point accumulation and triggering extinction events to expand your simulation even further. With each click, you’ll wat
features: Use the left mouse button to click, collect, and play the game.

games.title: Hexa Sort
games.description: Hexa Sort is an addictive puzzle-sorting game that combines strategic matching and merging challenges. In this brain teaser, you will get to shuffle, stack, and strategize to create satisfying color matches. Featuring sleek 3D graphics, a dazzling array of vibrant hues, and soothing gameplay, this addictive challenge strikes the perfect balance between excitement and relaxation. Whether you’re seeking a mental workout or a calming escape, Hexa Sort delivers an experience that’s as rewarding as i
features: Use the left mouse button to move the hexagon.

games.title: Prison Escape.io
games.description: Prison Escape.io is a multiplayer escape game where you race against time to outsmart guards, dodge tricky traps, and break free from confinement. Team up with friends or compete in wild multiplayer challenges. Every second counts as you run, jump, and strategize your way through daring escapes packed with surprises and nonstop excitement.Collect shiny coins, unlock fun outfits, and use awesome power-ups to boost your escape. Every level is packed with surprises—are you fast, smart, and brave en
features: WASD or arrow keys = move around
Space = jump and fly if you have a jetpack

games.title: Simply Prop Hunt
games.description: Simply Prop Hunt is a fast-paced multiplayer hide-and-seek game with a clever twist. Players take turns disguising themselves as everyday objects or hunting down hidden props. As a prop, your goal is to blend seamlessly into the environment and avoid detection. As a hunter, you’ll need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to uncover the sneakiest disguises before time runs out. With fast and unpredictable rounds, every match is a new challenge. Outsmart your opponents, stay hidden until the final whist
features: Space = jump / fly with jet (when playing as Hunter)

games.title: Space Waves
games.description: Space Waves is an arcade game where you need to control an arrow to avoid obstacles until you get to the end. There are 33 levels to the game, and you can choose any level you want to play at any time. All levels vary in difficulty and are labeled accordingly with faces; this way you get to decide how courageous you want to be. How to Play Space Waves All 33 levels of Space Waves more or less have the same scope – get to the end of the level without crashing your arrow into a wall, a rotating co

games.title: Holey.io Battle Royale
games.description: Holey.io is a battle royale game where you consume various items and opponents with smaller holes. You will grow bigger as you swallow! The map will continuously shrink, forcing players into a narrower environment until there is only one person left standing. Consume, grow, and become the last hole standing in the arena!Once you've become the ultimate hole, check out some more popular .io games like Cubes 2048 and Agar.io!FeaturesEarn and equip unique skinsUse strong power-ups to boost your
features: Hold left-click / space bar = speed up
Click the on-screen button = speed up

games.title: Bit Gun.io
games.description: Bit Gun.io is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS where you test your tactical skills in intense 5v5 battles. Customize your arsenal, master unique weapons, and rise through the ranks in thrilling PvP combat. Join forces with friends, strategize, and dominate the arena in this action-packed shooting experience that rewards teamwork and precision.

games.title: Escape From Prison Multiplayer
games.description: Escape From Prison Multiplayer is a thrilling multiplayer platformer game where your mission is to make a daring escape from prison! Customize your brave little mouse and race against time to break out. Each room you conquer brings you closer to freedom, but watch out for the dangerous traps and obstacles in your way! Can you outsmart the prison's challenges and make a successful escape? Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to flee from prison! Release Date July 2024 Platf

games.title: EvoWars.io
games.description: EvoWars.io is an IO battle game set in a top-down online battle arena. Collect orbs and battle other players to evolve your warrior. Each evolution improves your weapon range but slows your movement. How many will you slay before you fall?How to Play EvoWars.ioEmbark on an epic quest across the digital battlefield, where you’ll collect powerful orbs to evolve your warrior into unstoppable forms. As you slash through enemies with swords, axes, and a brutal arsenal of weapons, each battle pushes y
features: Move your mouse = control the character's movement

games.title: Escape From Pizzeria
games.description: Escape From Pizzeria is a adventure game where you’re trapped inside a dark, eerie restaurant with secrets lurking in every corner. You’ll navigate creepy hallways, dodge traps, and uncover clues to escape. Stay alert, think fast, and whatever you do, don’t let the chef catch you snooping around his haunted kitchen.

games.title: Cubes 2048.io
games.description: Cubes 2048.io is an addictive online game that fuses Snake and 2048. Get a bigger number by collecting free cubes and eating other players with a smaller number than you. Your cubes with the same value that bump into one another will merge. How to PlayMerge blocks to growCubes 2048 turns 2048 into a 3D .io game! Slide around the arena picking up blocks to get bigger. Picking up two of the same number will merge them into a single block as the total sum of both.Consume the competitionIn Cubes 204
features: Hold left-click or space bar = speed up
Click the on-screen button = speed up

games.title: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer
games.description: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer is a fast-paced multiplayer game where you swing, launch, and fling your custom-built dummy across wild obstacle maps. You’ll race to escape the factory, grab onto anchor points, and chase the top of the daily leaderboard. With new maps each day, your timing and creativity decide how far you’ll go.
features: Just tap anywhere on the screen or press any key on your keyboard to play. It’s that easy!

games.title: Make Up Hole
games.description: Makeup Hole is the ultimate beauty game where you control a magical hole that collects makeup items to create stunning makeovers. Dive into addictive gameplay as you gather cosmetics, unleash your creativity, and transform the girl into a true style icon. Explore vibrant levels filled with makeup treasures, from bold eyeshadows and radiant blushes to luscious lipsticks. Strategically guide the makeup hole to collect the perfect combination of items and craft dazzling looks. With every level, you

games.title: Crazy Miners
games.description: Crazy Miners is a fast-paced digging battle where you race to find the diamond hidden deep in the map! Dig through the terrain, avoid traps, collect diamond fragments to unlock new skins and power-ups, throw TNT to clear your path (or sabotage others), and be the first to claim victory!

games.title: She is Mad
games.description: She is Mad is a dark fantasy adventure where black magic twists a family’s fate into chaos. Your daughter vanishes, your wife transforms into a terrifying demon, and the world fills with angels, demons, and mysterious pagans. As you struggle through uncertainty and danger, every choice tests your courage and forces you to question who you can truly trust.

games.title: The Farmers
games.description: The Farmers is a charming farming adventure where you create and grow your own paradise. You’ll cultivate crops, craft delicious recipes, and expand your land into thriving new territories. Along the way, you’ll uncover secrets hidden across the islands, meet interesting characters, and enjoy heartfelt stories that bring your farm world to life.Features FIT OUT and develop your farm. HARVEST crops and create new recipes. EXPLORE new lands and islands, and learn what these places have to tell. ME
features: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

games.title: Demon Smasher
games.description: Demon Smasher is a retro-inspired roguelike that’s easy to pick up yet tough to master. Fight waves of diverse enemies across shifting maps, collect gems, and upgrade your skills to grow stronger with every level. Daily rewards and a cosmetic shop with unlockable character skins add extra incentives, making each run fresh and rewarding.

games.title: Twerk Race 3d - Fun Run Game!
games.description: Twerk Race 3d - Fun Run Game! is a quirky blend of racing and dancing where your eating choices shape your performance. Sprint across colorful tracks, dodge obstacles, and collect food to transform your physique—light snacks keep you slim and speedy, while heavier bites bulk you up for the final showdown. Finish the run with an epic twerk battle to claim victory in this hilarious race-meets-dance adventure.FeaturesFast & Fun Gameplay – Run, dodge obstacles, and collect food to change your sh
features: Space bar or left mouse button = start/set jump power (after completing a level)

games.title: Field Master
games.description: Field Master is a casual farming simulator that puts you behind the wheel of powerful agricultural machines. Experience the full farming cycle as you plow vast fields with your tractor, sow seeds with precision seeders, and carefully nurture your crops as they grow. When harvest season arrives, take control of massive combines to reap the rewards of your hard work. From soil preparation to harvest, every step is in your hands, making Field Master the perfect blend of relaxation and realism for f

games.title: Take Actions
games.description: Take Actions is a third-person shooter packed with cinematic slow-motion combat and a gripping storyline. Fight your way out of an underground bunker, wreak havoc in a nightclub showdown, and face the ultimate boss battle. With seven unique weapons, advanced physics, and the power to bend time, every encounter delivers intense, action-driven gameplay.

games.title: Noob: Space Escape!
games.description: Noob: Space Escape! is a survival crafting adventure where you guide Noob through a mysterious floating world filled with danger. Gather resources, upgrade your gear, and battle monsters as you work to repair your rocket. Explore hidden islands packed with traps, secrets, and fierce enemies, digging, building, and fighting your way toward freedom before time runs out.

games.title: Idle Transport Tycoon
games.description: Idle Transport Tycoon is a strategic idle game that puts you in charge of building a thriving transport empire. You’ll unlock new countries, link airports, and expand your network across the globe. By assembling a powerful fleet of airplanes and managing passenger flow, you shape the growth of a bustling aviation empire step by step.In Idle Transport Tycoon, idle gameplay meets tycoon mechanics, creating an addictive and engaging experience. Strategise your moves, optimise routes, and watch your
features: Left mouse button = interact with the in-game UI
Up and down keys = zoom in and zoom out

games.title: Jet Bouncer
games.description: Jet Bouncer is a modern twist on the classic brick-breaker formula, blending fast-paced gameplay with fresh layers of strategy. You’ll smash through varied level layouts, adapt to unique enemy encounters, and challenge powerful bosses. With metaprogression systems to enhance your abilities, every run offers new upgrades, surprises, and evolving challenges that keep the action endlessly engaging.

games.title: Mysterious Elevator
games.description: Mysterious Elevator is a thrilling math and logic game that challenges your mind as you try to escape a mysterious skyscraper with 100 floors. Each floor is guarded by the Keeper of Numbers, a sarcastic master of mathematical riddles who won’t let you pass without solving his clever puzzles.Swap numbered and symbol blocks to build correct equations, solve additional riddles, and overcome tricky logical traps. Every puzzle is a new test of your skills, ranging from simple arithmetic to devious br

games.title: Shell Shockers
games.description: Shell Shockers (Shellshock.io) is a multiplayer .io FPS game featuring eggs armed with guns. You control one of these weapon-wielding eggs in one of four online game modes where the aim is to shatter your opponents with bullets and bombs. It's the ultimate online egg shooting game!Kids love games where they shoot other players. Whatever you think about guns this seems to always be the case. We let our children play Shell Shockers before the older rating games with guns because it's a les

games.title: Four Colors
games.description: Four Colors lets you play the popular card game for free in your web browser. The aim of the game is to be the first player with no cards, similar to other Crazy Eights style card games. Play a game like UNO in multiplayer with 2, 3, or 4 players. How to Play Four Colors There are various strategies you can use to maximize your chances of winning at this multiplayer UNO-inspired game. The main principle is to get rid of all your cards before everyone else. You can do that by matching the color o
features: Use the left mouse button to play the cards.

games.title: Agar.io
games.description: Agar.io is the original .io grow game. Play as a simple agar cell fighting to become the largest cell in a multiplayer game arena. Avoid the bigger cells and consume the smaller ones to grow larger. This is a simple game about growing your single-cell organism bigger than other players. We love it in our family because there is a surprising amount of strategy and collaboration. You need to pay attention to other players to decide if you are bigger or smaller than them. Taking your time and hidin

games.title: Geometry Game
games.description: Geometry Dash Online is a free side-scrolling platformer played in sync with musical rhythms. Groove your way over and under obstacles to keep the musical momentum alive. If you slip up, it’s back to the beginning!This game became our family obsession during lockdown but we have recently returned to play it.
